SourceProxy.name: GismoReader
SourceProxy.label: Gismo Reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a Gismo file into an image data.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Gismo reader reads Gimso XML files, and the output is a uniform rectilinear (image/volume) dataset. The default file extension is .png.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the PNG reader.
